Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

Property.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a physician or registered nurse, based on clinical and laboratory data, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.  2. The process by which a patient's condition is appraised or evaluated. (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has a Doctor, Nurse or other
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has a Doctor, Nurse or other health professional ever performed a physical check of your breasts, examining for lumps? (i.e. a  breast examination)
